title: Potato and cheese omelette
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '450g potatoes, peeled and finely diced', '1/2 red onion, diced', '2 large green peppers, seeded and diced', '200g tomatoes, chopped', '6 large eggs', '110g grated Gruyere cheese', '2 tablespoons creme fraiche', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
